fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
The primary policy areas followed are 
- Environment policy 
- Energy policy 
- Telecommunications policy & digital agenda 
- Financial services 
- Competition Policy
membership: Not applicable. SkillSet is not part of any association/federation/confederation or network
goals__remit:
The aim of SkillSet is to help clients implement new technologies and improve business processes, drawing on a network of developers, designers, project managers and program managers with diverse specialisations subject to the requirements of each engagement. 
 
In addition, SkillSet provides strategic advice to companies and organisations wanting to improve relations with EU institutions and with the agencies of EU member Governments.
position: Senior Consultant on relations with EU institutions
